question: Calculate the length of Line_A_B.
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 6-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 5, rotation angle pi/6 radians. Total 1 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'concentric' rule. Concentric derivation: 6-sided polygon (center O1) scaled by 1/2. Found 13 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 0 new lines and 0 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 12, total arcs: 0, total points: 13.
增强操作总轮数: 0
api_results: A regular hexagon with center O1 and side length 5 is given. A second, smaller regular hexagon, concentric with the first and scaled by a factor of 1/2, is inscribed within it. The outer hexagon has vertices labeled A, B, C, D, E, F in counterclockwise order, starting from the rightmost vertex. Point A and point B are adjacent vertices of the outer hexagon. Calculate the length of line segment AB.
